entry.title: There is a desperate need for political compromise in Georgia. Kipiani

media:group.media:title: There is a desperate need for political compromise in Georgia. Kipiani
media:group.media:description:
Syuzi Muradyan has talked to Victor Kipiani, the Chair of the Geocase think tank, about the protests held in Georgia and the possible solution to the created crisis.
